name: @nekogaming/eslint-config
description: Pluggable ESLint configs for ECMAScript Next, Node.js and React Native that you can import, extend and override

scripts.precommit: cd packages/esnext && npm run prepare && cd ../node && npm run prepare && cd ../react-native && npm run prepare && cd ../..

author: Neko Boi Nick <thakyz@nekogaming.xyz> (https://www.nekogaming.xyz/)
